pageContent: Objectives: Prostate cancer treatment is a significant source of morbidity and healthcare spending. Evolving clinical data have supported expanding surveillance as a means to "right-size" treatment. Integrated delivery systems afford the possibility of hastening this objective.

metaData.source:
In the middle and on the sideline: the experience of spouses of men with prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22565105/
